channel.title: EvionX New 317! Staff Spots Open!
channel.description:
[url=http://www.evionx.com]Website[/url] [url=http://www.evionx.com/play.php]Play Now![/url] [url=http://www.evionx.com/EvionX%20Loader.jar]Download Client![/url] Welcome to the advertisement thread of EvionX! A new 317 that is going to make it's mark in the rsps world! EvionX was put online on 6/25/14 and we are just starting to grow! It would be amazing if you would joing this new community and watch it grow bigger! There is a lot to do in this Eco/Pking/PvE server and you will have loads of content updates daily and you will surely have an amazing experience. We are also hosted on a very powerful dedi which makes the server very smooth to play! We have a new website design that was specfically designed for us and no one else. I will post pictures, come join in on the fun now! *Also when you download the catch, if it gets stuck on 98% simply restart the client and it will fix itself!
Here are some pictures from the server!
[img]http://evionx.com/extimg/40.png[/img] Familiers Work! [img]http://evionx.com/extimg/41.jpg[/img] Comp Cape and RFD! [img]http://evionx.com/extimg/42.png[/img] [img]http://evionx.com/extimg/43.png[/img] [img]http://evionx.com/extimg/44.png[/img] [img]http://evionx.com/extimg/45.png[/img] Bank Tabs! [img]http://evionx.com/extimg/46.png[/img] [img]http://evionx.com/extimg/47.png[/img] [img]http://evionx.com/extimg/48.jpg[/img] [img]http://evionx.com/extimg/49.png[/img] [img]http://evionx.com/extimg/50.png[/img] [img]http://evionx.com/extimg/51.png[/img] [img]http://evionx.com/extimg/52.png[/img] [img]http://evionx.com/extimg/53.png[/img] High Scores! [img]http://evionx.com/extimg/54.png[/img] [img]http://evionx.com/extimg/55.png[/img] [img]http://evionx.com/extimg/56.jpg[/img] Duo Slayer and Solo Slayer! [img]http://evionx.com/extimg/57.jpg[/img] [img]http://evionx.com/extimg/58.jpg[/img] [img]http://evionx.com/extimg/59.jpg[/img] [img]http://evionx.com/extimg/60.jpg[/img]
I hope to see you on the server! Please join now! Staff spots are open!

I love a server where you pay real money to get good items. :palm:

item.title: EvionX New 317! Staff Spots Open!
item.dc:creator: @Assassin1216 Assassin1216
item.description:
@Assassin1216 wrote:

You have donating options already? You should be focusing on building the game. Nothing makes this stand out. You have all the shops, altars, and portals in one area. And it’s in over used edgeville.

Read full topic
